column1: Golug was a word from a language of the Orcs
column2: whose only recorded use was during the later First Age
column3: used to describe the Deep Elves (the Noldor). Its origins are unknown
column4: but it may be related to the Sindarin name for this same people

column1: :Golug is used in Orkish. Much like in the books
column4: a female form (golgi) and a plural (golgai) also existhttp://midgardsmal.com/yrksk-ordabok/. It is also used in Black Speech.
